name: iionly/izap_videos
description: Video plugin for Elgg. Supports addition of both on-server and off-server videos.

suggest.coldtrick/widget_manager: With the Widget Manager plugin available the iZAP Videos plugin offers widgets for the index page (homepage) and group profile pages listing the latest videos.
suggest.iionly/elggx_fivestar: With the Elggx Fivestar plugin enabled the site members can rate videos.
suggest.iionly/elggx_userpoints: With the Elggx Userpoints plugin enabled the site members gain userpoints on adding videos.
